document_data.name: Burrowing Owl
document_data.mainbody: '''Burrowing owls''' were a species of [[owl]] that inhabited the [[High Desert]] of [[Zakhara]], on the plains north of the [[Range of the Marching Camels]].
document_data.Description: These owls possessed golden feathers and talons twice the size of normal owls.
document_data.Behavior: Burrowing owls typically lived near patches of [[ab'i]] tubers. The owls would use their large talons to burrow several feet into the ground to avoid the daytime heat. They could be found in groups of 2–8 individuals.  Travelers attempting to harvest the ab'i who disturbed the owls were attacked aggressively.
